entries.title_d: Before the freighter with our cargo could get to our lockup, it was intercepted and robbed. It would seem that the freighter left your protection too soon. Go to Dantooine and recover our stolen cargo.
entries.title: Dantooine System: Retrieve the ship with the stolen cargo.
entries.thanks_1: Don't worry, your time will come.
entries.taunt_5: If we cannot have it, no one shall.
entries.taunt_3: We will have that cargo and discover it's contents!
entries.taunt_2: We would welcome death over failure!
entries.taunt_1: If we cannot have it, no one shall.
entries.target_disabled: \#pcontrast3 Tactical Computer: < \#pcontrast1 Target has successfully been disabled. \#pcontrast3 >
entries.recovery_success: \#pcontrast3 Station Command: < \#pcontrast1 Good job pilot, the cargo has been recovered and is on it's way to our lockup. \#pcontrast3 >
entries.quest_recover_d: Pull up close to begin the capture protocol
entries.quest_location_d: Head to last known location of the thieves who stole the cargo.
entries.quest_escort_d: Escort the captive ship into position for a hyperspace jump
entries.quest_disable_d: Target the ship's engines to disable it
entries.panic_2: Give up! You've never recover this cargo.
entries.failed_escape: \#pcontrast3 Station Command: < \#pcontrast1 They have eluded us. We'll try to get a fix on their location. Report back in for further updates. \#pcontrast3 >
entries.failed_destroy: \#pcontrast3 Station Command: < \#pcontrast1 Damn, we needed that vessel intact. The cargo has been lost... no, it was transfered to another ship. Return for further information. > \#pcontrast3
entries.escort_wiped_out: \#pcontrast3 Tacitcal Computer: < \#pcontrast1 The escort has been wiped out, proceed with primary objective. \#pcontrast3 >
entries.escort_remaining: \#pcontrast3 Tactical Computer < \#pcontrast1 An escort has been destroyed, %DI remain in the escort \#pcontrast3 >
entries.complete: I appear to be at your mercy, Captain.  Shall we get moving then?
entries.capture_complete: Ship systems have been captured, setting autopilot for jump to hyperspace.
entries.attack_notify: Enemy craft detected on attack vector.
entries.arrival_phase_2: \#pcontrast3 Tactical Computer: < \#pcontrast1 The thieves have appeared.  Preparing systems for combat. \#pcontrast3 >
entries.arrival_phase_1: \#pcontrast3 Station Command: <\#pcontrast1 Stay alert, the thieves are close. \#pcontrast3>
entries.angry_disable: Do you really think you have won?
entries.abort: You let the cargo get away! Pray we can get a fix on it's location before it's too late.
